DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Prevalence Risk Factors Patients With Peri-implant Diseaseï¼ša Retrospective Study
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To investigate patient-related risk factor peri-implant disease partially edentulous patient rehabilitate implant support crown bridge provide evidence clinical prevention control . Methods : A total 131 patient enroll study . Univariate multivariate logistic regression analysis use determine patient factor associate peri-implant disease . The variable include age , gender , smoke alcohol consumption , presence diabetes , cardiovascular disease , osteoporosis , bruxism , bleed upon brushing , reason extraction , oral hygiene periodontal status .
DOC.criteria: Patients implant least one implant restore implantsupported fix partial denture single crown . The implantsupported fixed partial denture single crown function least one year . Jaw radiotherapy treatment implant . Patients bruxism , xerostomia adjacent teeth periapical periodontitis . Patients suffer oral mucosa disease , aggressive periodontitis jaw defect . Patients suffer mental psychological disease influence oral health normal maintenance .
